title: Awarding the Contract for supplying of Empty Metal LPG Cylinders to 	the Litro Gas Lanka Limited for the year 2020
decision_details:
- The proposal made by Hon. Prime Minister in his capacity as the Minister of 	Finance to award the Contract for the supply of Empty Metal LPG Cylinders 	to the Litro Gas Lanka Limited as stated below on the recommendation of the 	Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the 	Cabinet. 
	
*	The Contract for the supply of 22,000, 105,056 and 1,260 cylinders under the categories of 2.3kg 12.5kg and 37.5 kg respectively to M/s. Metal Mate Co. Ltd. at a sum of US$ 2.18 million

*	The Contract for the supply of 117,040 cylinders under the category of 5kg to M/s Sahamitr Pressure Containers Public Co. Ltd. at a sum of US$ 1.58 million
